item.title: Mentioned by Yahoo! News Canada (blog)
item.description:
PQ politician falls asleep in legislature, says he might have sleeping disorder
Other politicians caught falling asleep: Conservative MP Rob Anders in the House of Commons: Jason Kenney at Peter Lougheed's funeral service: NDP MP Jonathan Genest-Jourdain during a debate about the long-gun registry: Are you a politics junkie?
